availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel G. Suddarth (Quarter Master General of Kentucky)

body.p: Kentucky attorney and soldier. Adair county native. Married to Nancy B. Suddarth. Father of Clay Suddarth, Tyler Suddarth, and Samuel Suddarth. Served as Quarter Master General of Kentucky from September 1863 to January 1866.

ab.bibl: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), VII. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 61.
